posts.post_title: Early 20th Century "1889" 8x12 Boston Club "Opening Game" Publication - SOLD -
posts.post_content:
Early 20th Century (1920's-1940's) - "1889" 8x12 "Opening Game of the Boston Baseball Club Publication (Against N.Y.) 

I will email scans as they won't load to this page - Simply email me at [url]jeremyj70@comcast.net[/url] - SOLD -

Thanks, Jeremy 

P.S. This is a really nice publication with team composite of Boston as well as N.Y. team on ball diamond. Would look great framed... Exact date can't be determined Either way, looks fantastic - Make an offer, any offer...
